abstract: In an internal memo obtained by DealBook, the financial firm’s chief executive, Brian T. Moynihan, noted that it would be difficult to “manage through reductions,” but emphasized that the bank “will get through these challenges.”
snippet: In an internal memo obtained by DealBook, the financial firm’s chief executive, Brian T. Moynihan, noted that it would be difficult to “manage through reductions,” but emphasized that the bank “will get through these challenges.”
lead_paragraph: The pain continues at Bank of America.
